data.title: How to Reserve a Group BBQ Area
data.text:
The Group BBQ Online Reservation Guide offers step by step instructions.

Reservations open at midnight 21 days in advance for Santa Monica residents and 14 days in advance for non-residents. Reservations close 3 days in advance for all groups.

The following Group BBQ areas are reservable:

Airport Park includes 6 picnic tables and 2 bbq pits, and is located east of the playground adjacent to the parking lot.

Clover Park Area #1 includes 9 picnic tables and 3 bbq pits, and is located south of the office adjacent to the parking lot.

Clover Park Area #2 includes 8 picnic tables and 2 bbq pits, and is located northwest of the office along Ocean Park Blvd.

Marine Park includes 4 picnic tables and 3 bbq pits, and is located on the border of the park south of the Auditorium and playground.

Virginia Avenue Park includes 4 picnic tables and 2 bbq pits.

No. Exclusive use of permitted BBQ areas is available from 11:00 am to 3:00 pm only. Outside of the permitted timeframe, Group BBQ areas are available on a first-come, first-served basis.
